# VNHorizonObservation

**Class**

The horizon angle information that an image-analysis request detects.

## Declaration

```swift
class VNHorizonObservation
```

## Overview

Instances of this class result from invoking a [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNDetectHorizonRequest], and report the [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNHorizonObservation/angle] and [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/VNHorizonObservation/transform] of the horizon in an image.

## Evaluating the Horizon

- **angle**: The angle of the observed horizon.
- **transform**: The transform to apply to the detected horizon.
- **transform(forImageWidth:height:)**: Creates an affine transform for the specified image width and height.

## Horizon detection

- **VNDetectHorizonRequest**: An image-analysis request that determines the horizon angle in an image.
